rdfs:label: dateTimeClass
dc:description: Date-times should conform to ISO8601 date-time format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.000000Z (year, month, day, hour (24h), minute, second, optional fractional seconds, and optional UTC time indicator. Any variation on the full form is allowed.

rdfs:label: nameClass
dc:description: The allowed characters are alphanumeric, hyphen, and underscore.

rdfs:label: numericClass
dc:description: Value must be a valid numerical value.

rdfs:label: textClass
dc:description: Values that have the characteristics of text such as in descriptions. The text characters include printable characters (32 <= ASCII  < 127) excluding comma, square bracket and curly braces as well as nonascii (ASCII codes > 127).
